access_token.title: Access Token
access_token.description: API Access token. You can get this from the web control panel

root_folder_id.title: Root Folder ID
root_folder_id.description: ID of the root folder. Leave blank normally, rclone will fill it in automatically

account_id.title: Account ID
account_id.description: Account ID. Leave blank normally, rclone will fill it in automatically

list_chunk.title: List Chunk
list_chunk.description: Number of items to list in each call
